review: I was very disappointed in the amazon fire stick. In fact I really had planned to return it but so far I haven't had the chance to get it to the post office. I have tried several movies but every one of them will stop and get the spinning symbol and then say that it is not connected to the internet when there is a perfectly good signal. I also put on the app for my ipad and experienced the same problems from there. I finally had to watch the end of the movie on my ipad since I could not get it to be reliable on the fire stick connected to my TV. I had read on the forum about the same problem happening to others with the fire stick. I tried the same solutions that they had tried but did not have success. I also was upset that the price of this item was on sale for $10 less a few weeks after I had purchased it. As a prime member I think some type of price protection especially for amazon produced items should be given. I will probably try google chromecast to replace the fire stick.
